flawed_nl_solution:
Three weeks ago, there were 40 - 10 = <<40-10=30>>30 campers.
The total number of campers from three to two weeks ago is 30 + 40 = <<30+40=40>>40.
Hence, there were 150 - 40 = <<150-40=110>>110 campers last week.
#### 110

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 40. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
